tool.name: OTB.ReadImageInfo
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayin False output_data_outkwl $output_data_outkwl output_data_indexx $output_data_indexx output_data_indexy $output_data_indexy output_data_sizex $output_data_sizex output_data_sizey $output_data_sizey output_data_spacingx $output_data_spacingx output_data_spacingy $output_data_spacingy output_data_originx $output_data_originx output_data_originy $output_data_originy output_data_estimatedgroundspacingx $output_data_estimatedgroundspacingx output_data_estimatedgroundspacingy $output_data_estimatedgroundspacingy output_data_numberbands $output_data_numberbands output_data_sensor $output_data_sensor output_data_id $output_data_id output_data_time $output_data_time output_data_ullat $output_data_ullat output_data_ullon $output_data_ullon output_data_urlat $output_data_urlat output_data_urlon $output_data_urlon output_data_lrlat $output_data_lrlat output_data_lrlon $output_data_lrlon output_data_lllat $output_data_lllat output_data_lllon $output_data_lllon output_data_town $output_data_town output_data_country $output_data_country output_data_rgb_r $output_data_rgb_r output_data_rgb_g $output_data_rgb_g output_data_rgb_b $output_data_rgb_b output_data_projectionref $output_data_projectionref output_data_keyword $output_data_keyword output_data_gcp_count $output_data_gcp_count output_data_gcp_proj $output_data_gcp_proj output_data_gcp_ids $output_data_gcp_ids output_data_gcp_info $output_data_gcp_info output_data_gcp_imcoord $output_data_gcp_imcoord output_data_gcp_geocoord $output_data_gcp_geocoord name OTB.ReadImageInfo in $in keywordlist $keywordlist prefer $prefer response $response outputType_outkwl $OutputSection_outkwl.outputType_outkwl transmissionMode_outkwl $OutputSection_outkwl.transmissionMode_outkwl transmissionMode_indexx $OutputSection_indexx.transmissionMode_indexx transmissionMode_indexy $OutputSection_indexy.transmissionMode_indexy transmissionMode_sizex $OutputSection_sizex.transmissionMode_sizex transmissionMode_sizey $OutputSection_sizey.transmissionMode_sizey transmissionMode_spacingx $OutputSection_spacingx.transmissionMode_spacingx transmissionMode_spacingy $OutputSection_spacingy.transmissionMode_spacingy transmissionMode_originx $OutputSection_originx.transmissionMode_originx transmissionMode_originy $OutputSection_originy.transmissionMode_originy transmissionMode_estimatedgroundspacingx $OutputSection_estimatedgroundspacingx.transmissionMode_estimatedgroundspacingx transmissionMode_estimatedgroundspacingy $OutputSection_estimatedgroundspacingy.transmissionMode_estimatedgroundspacingy transmissionMode_numberbands $OutputSection_numberbands.transmissionMode_numberbands transmissionMode_sensor $OutputSection_sensor.transmissionMode_sensor transmissionMode_id $OutputSection_id.transmissionMode_id transmissionMode_time $OutputSection_time.transmissionMode_time transmissionMode_ullat $OutputSection_ullat.transmissionMode_ullat transmissionMode_ullon $OutputSection_ullon.transmissionMode_ullon transmissionMode_urlat $OutputSection_urlat.transmissionMode_urlat transmissionMode_urlon $OutputSection_urlon.transmissionMode_urlon transmissionMode_lrlat $OutputSection_lrlat.transmissionMode_lrlat transmissionMode_lrlon $OutputSection_lrlon.transmissionMode_lrlon transmissionMode_lllat $OutputSection_lllat.transmissionMode_lllat transmissionMode_lllon $OutputSection_lllon.transmissionMode_lllon transmissionMode_town $OutputSection_town.transmissionMode_town transmissionMode_country $OutputSection_country.transmissionMode_country transmissionMode_rgb_r $OutputSection_rgb_r.transmissionMode_rgb_r transmissionMode_rgb_g $OutputSection_rgb_g.transmissionMode_rgb_g transmissionMode_rgb_b $OutputSection_rgb_b.transmissionMode_rgb_b transmissionMode_projectionref $OutputSection_projectionref.transmissionMode_projectionref transmissionMode_keyword $OutputSection_keyword.transmissionMode_keyword transmissionMode_gcp_count $OutputSection_gcp_count.transmissionMode_gcp_count transmissionMode_gcp_proj $OutputSection_gcp_proj.transmissionMode_gcp_proj transmissionMode_gcp_ids $OutputSection_gcp_ids.transmissionMode_gcp_ids transmissionMode_gcp_info $OutputSection_gcp_info.transmissionMode_gcp_info transmissionMode_gcp_imcoord $OutputSection_gcp_imcoord.transmissionMode_gcp_imcoord transmissionMode_gcp_geocoord $OutputSection_gcp_geocoord.transmissionMode_gcp_geocoord

param.name: in
param.label: Input image to analyse
param.help: Input image to analyse The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, jpeg, tiff

param.name: keywordlist
param.label: Output the OSSIM keyword list. It contains metadata information (sensor model, geometry ). Information is stored in keyword list (pairs of key/value)
param.help: Output the OSSIM keyword list. It contains metadata information (sensor model, geometry ). Information is stored in keyword list (pairs of key/value)

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_outkwl
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_outkwl
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...
